title: Yellow dot in my promo series?
body:
Hello, so I just entered my promo series a 2nd time to get to gold and in my first game slot there is a yellow dot there. What does this mean? That I instantly lose a game without playing it? 

Thanks,

Ringkiller

replies.body:
Quite the opposite Ring! Since you lost your last promos, you're starting this one off with a free win!! Best of luck getting through those promos!!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Question. What does it mean if its yellow if its my first time into my promo series? All three diamonds were blank and then i won a match and now its yellow instead of blue.
Did you find out what that means? It happened to me and i have no clue why.
Thank you very much! After winning 2 fairly quick games I became gold 5 and quickly got to gold 4!
